Name: Black Jack
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon twist (discarded) & Black Jack chew.
Review: For us Brits, this cocktail rekindles memories of the tuck shop and a black tongue from chewing on far too many Black Jacks. Happily, booze now takes the place of the sugar rush.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Jack contains 195 calories
